Participant: Welcome to CSSU x Purefacts Programming Challenge Day!
Given a series of calendars please find the largest span of free time available for everyone to meet between 9am and 5pm. The meeting times are specified in a CSV file with the following format:

StartTime: per client with the time in 24hr clock format and the resolution is per minute. imagine a VERY efficient office.

Participant: The program should return a start time (hh:mm) and duration (in min) for the longest meeting time free for all involved individuals. Please return "None" if no free time can be found.
